name: INTERNATIONAL ACADEMY OF COMPOUNDING PHARMACISTS (IACP)
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to health care as they impact compounding pharmacists. H.R.2871 - Preserving Patient Access to Compounded Medications Act of 2017.
Issues related to Medicare/Medicaid reimbursement of compounded medications and recommended changes to the Social Security Act; drug pricing (no specific bills).

Issues related to appropriations that would impact compounding pharmacies and pharmacists (no specific bills). Issues related to waste, fraud and abuse of funds and benefits (no specific bills). All F
